Uses of Interface
uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery.NativeDiscoveryStrategy

  • Packages that use NativeDiscoveryStrategy 
    Package Description
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery
    Provides components that can be used to automatically discover the location of the libvlc native libraries in the absence of proper run-time environment configuration.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery.linux
    Provides components that can be used to automatically discover the location of the libvlc native libraries on Linux.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery.mac
    Provides components that can be used to automatically discover the location of the libvlc native libraries on MacOS.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery.windows
    Provides components that can be used to automatically discover the location of the libvlc native libraries on Windows.

    • Uses of NativeDiscoveryStrategy in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery that implement NativeDiscoveryStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractNativeDiscoveryStrategy
      Base implementation for a component that attempts to locate the libvlc native resources.
      class  StandardNativeDiscoveryStrategy
      Implementation of a native library discovery strategy that searches in standard well-known directory locations.
      Constructors in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery with parameters of type NativeDiscoveryStrategy 
      Constructor and Description
      NativeDiscovery(NativeDiscoveryStrategy... discoveryStrategies)
      Create a discovery component with bespoke strategies.

    • Uses of NativeDiscoveryStrategy in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery.linux

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery.linux that implement NativeDiscoveryStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultLinuxNativeDiscoveryStrategy
      Default implementation of a native library discovery strategy that searches in standard well-known directory locations on Linux.

    • Uses of NativeDiscoveryStrategy in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery.mac

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery.mac that implement NativeDiscoveryStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultMacNativeDiscoveryStrategy
      Default implementation of a native library discovery strategy that searches in standard well-known directory locations on MacOS.

    • Uses of NativeDiscoveryStrategy in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery.windows

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.discovery.windows that implement NativeDiscoveryStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultWindowsNativeDiscoveryStrategy
      Default implementation of a native library discovery strategy that searches in standard well-known directory locations on Windows.
